title: Strengthening Shared Competencies in Social Studies Learning Design Through Mobile PBL Collaboration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with mobile learning platforms and foundational knowledge in social sector roles
context.additional_context: Focuses on sharing learning designs using PBL methodologies and developing collaborative competencies in smartphone-based learning environments. Provides real-world problem-solving experiences in social domains through real-time communication and small-group collaboration among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can complete a learning design for solving real-world problems in the social sector via mobile environments by applying the PBL (Project-Based Learning) methodology.
Learners can share drafts of learning designs with peer learners and incorporate feedback using collaboration tools.
Learners can set appropriate sharing scopes for learning designs based on situational contexts through access permission management.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
